content: Chinese video streaming website operator YY Inc and online retailer E-Commerce China DangDang Inc  on Thursday  became the latest in a string of Chinese companies to get offers to be taken private.
name: YY Inc
title: Two more Chinese tech companies get buyout offers from CEOs

content: * YY shares rise as much as 6.9 pct   (Adds E-Commerce China deal  analyst comment  details)
name: YY Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Two more Chinese tech companies get buyout offers from CEOs

content: July 9 Chinese video streaming website YY Inc  said Chief Executive David Li and Chairman Jun Lei offered to take the company private in a deal valued at about $3.7 billion.
name: YY Inc
title: REFILE-CEO  chairman offer to take YY private
